HELP.desc: Provides information for FIGDES2020 commands and patches
HELP.usage:
HELP
                    HELP [command]
                    HELP [patch-name]

    command - the name of the command to display help information about
    patch-name - the name of the patch to display help information about

CODE.desc:
Used to code patches for enhancing game features and unlocking
                    new game content
CODE.usage:
CODE [patch-name]

    patch-name - the name of the patch to be coded

PLAY.usage:
PLAY

Type PLAY with no parameters.

README.desc:
Displays a list of new features included in the current game
                    version
README.usage:
README

Type README with no parameters.

PATCHES.desc: Displays a list of all available game features for coding
PATCHES.usage:
PATCHES

Type PATCHES with no parameters.

PLAN.desc: Used to plan out complicated patches before they are coded
PLAN.usage:
PLAN [patch-name]

    patch-name - the name of the patch to plan for

SETNAME.usage:
SETNAME [name]

    name - the developer's new name

SAVE.usage:
SAVE

Type SAVE with no parameters.

H.usage:
H [command]

    command - the name of the command to display help information about

C.usage:
C [patch-name]

    patch-name - the name of the patch to be coded

S.usage:
S

Type S with no parameters.

R.usage:
R

Type R with no parameters.

P.usage:
P [patch-name]

    patch-name - the name of the patch to plan for

GETSTATS.desc: Outputs a list of the current game statistics
GETSTATS.usage:
GETSTATS

Type GETSTATS with no parameters.

TOGGLEGUI.desc:
Toggles visibility of the Graphical User Interface (The GUI is
                    turned off by default).
TOGGLEGUI.usage:
TOGGLEGUI

Type TOGGLEGUI with no parameters.

SETPREF.usage:
SETPREF [preference-name = value]

    preference-name - the name of the preference to be set
    value - the preference's new value

Example: SETPREF musicVolume = 5

PREFS.desc: Displays the current game preferences and their respective values
PREFS.usage:
PREFS

Type PREFS with no parameters.

GETMONEY.usage:
GETMONEY

Type GETMONEY with no parameters.

GETLUCK.desc: Displays the current value of the "luck" attribute
GETLUCK.usage:
GETLUCK

Type GETLUCK with no parameters.

GETENERGY.desc: Displays the current value of the "energy" attribute
GETENERGY.usage:
GETENERGY

Type GETENERGY with no parameters.

GETWISDOM.desc: Displays the current value of the "wisdom" attribute
GETWISDOM.usage:
GETWISDOM

Type GETWISDOM with no parameters.

GETHUNGER.desc: Displays the current value of the "hunger" attribute
GETHUNGER.usage:
GETHUNGER

Type GETHUNGER with no parameters.

GETINSANITY.desc: Displays the current value of the "insanity" attribute
GETINSANITY.usage:
GETINSANITY

Type GETINSANITY with no parameters.

BUYFOOD.desc: Purchases edible food for developer consumption at $20 per food
BUYFOOD.usage:
BUYFOOD [quantity]

    quantity - the number of edible food to be bought.

EAT.usage:
EAT

Type EAT with no parameters.

TOGGLEMUSIC.usage:
TOGGLEMUSIC

Type TOGGLEMUSIC with no parameters.

SETMUSIC.desc: Changes the background music to a different track
SETMUSIC.usage:
SETMUSIC [track-number]

    track-number - the number of the music track to be played

GETMUSIC.usage:
GETMUSIC

Type GETMUSIC with no parameters.
